metadata.title: CVE-2021-23926 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The XML parsers used by XMLBeans up to version 2.6.0 did not set theproperties needed to protect the user from malicious XML input.Vulnerabilities include possibilities for XML Entity Expansion attacks.Affects XMLBeans up to and including v2.6.0.

criterions.comment: xmlbeans: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
